message.content:
We start by extracting the key numbers from the three statements (using the “End_amount” figures):

1. From the Balance Sheet (2024-01-28):
 • Total Current Assets = 9,963,057.95  
 • Total Current Liabilities = 829,755.77  
 • Total Assets = 15,023,526.85  
 • Total Liabilities = (Total Assets – Total Owner's Equity) = 15,023,526.85 – 14,193,771.08 = 829,755.77  

2. From the Cash Flow Statement:
 • Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities = –224,133.22  
 • Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities = –106,218.20  
 • (The “Net Increase” in cash is –330,351.42, which is the sum of the above.)  

3. From the Income Statement:
 • Gross Profit = 2,610,115.02  
 • Total Revenue = 5,695,115.02  
 • Net Profit = 1,193,771.08  

4. From the Balance Sheet “Cash” items (for liquidity):
 • Cash on Hand = 3,730,866.78  
 • Bank Deposits = 3,938,781.80  
 • Combined Cash = 3,730,866.78 + 3,938,781.80 = 7,669,648.58

Now, we compute each indicator step by step:

A. Current Ratio  
 Formula: Current Ratio = Total Current Assets / Total Current Liabilities  
 = 9,963,057.95 / 829,755.77 ≈ 12.01

B. Gross Profit Margin  
 Formula: Gross Profit Margin = (Gross Profit / Total Revenue) × 100  
 = (2,610,115.02 / 5,695,115.02) × 100 ≈ 45.80%

C. Debt to Asset Ratio  
 Formula: Debt to Asset Ratio = Total Liabilities / Total Assets  
 = 829,755.77 / 15,023,526.85 ≈ 0.0552, which rounds to approximately 0.06

D. Net Profit Margin  
 Formula: Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit / Total Revenue) × 100  
 = (1,193,771.08 / 5,695,115.02) × 100 ≈ 20.95%

E. Cash to Current Debt Ratio  
 Formula: Cash to Current Debt Ratio = (Cash on Hand + Bank Deposits) / Total Current Liabilities  
 = 7,669,648.58 / 829,755.77 ≈ 9.25

F. Free Cash Flow (FCF)  
 Definition used here: FCF = Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities + Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities  
 = –224,133.22 + (–106,218.20) = –330,351.42

G. Return on Assets (ROA)  
 Formula: ROA = (Net Profit / Total Assets) × 100  
 = (1,193,771.08 / 15,023,526.85) × 100 ≈ 7.94%

Thus, the solution in the required JSON format is as follows:

{
  "solution": {
    "Current Ratio": "12.01",
    "Gross Profit Margin": "45.80%",
    "Debt to Asset Ratio": "0.06",
    "Net Profit Margin": "20.95%",
    "Cash to Current Debt Ratio": "9.25",
    "Free Cash Flow (FCF)": "-330351.42",
    "Return on Assets (ROA)": "7.94%"
  }
}
